body:
## How does it work?

- You give us your email address
- We send you an email
- In the email is a link you click to confirm your email address

That's it.

You can now come back to this application and click on the 'Return to previous application' link on the start page

You will have 1 day to confirm your email from the time you give us your address

- How long do we store your data and files for? 28 days
- How long does your session last? 30 minutes
- How do we store your data and files? Encrypted at all times

## Enhanced security

If you have any reason to think someone else might access your email account, please consider using two-factor authentication.

You can choose this option at the same time as entering your email address. If you do so, you will be asked for your mobile number when you have confirmed your email address.

### What is two-factor authentication?
heading: Return process
